tidychangepoint 0.0.0.9032
  • Reference
  • Articles
    Central England Temperature Using Taimal's algorithm

    Extract changepoints

    changepoints.Rd

    Not to be confused with wbs::changepoints(), which returns different information.

    Usage

    # S3 method for mod_default
changepoints(x, ...)

# S3 method for seg_default
changepoints(x, ...)

# S3 method for tidycpt
changepoints(x, ...)

changepoints_labels(x, ...)

changepoints(x, ...)

params(x, ...)

# S3 method for ga
changepoints(x, ...)

# S3 method for cpt
changepoints(x, ...)

# S3 method for wbs
changepoints(x, ...)

    Arguments

    x

    A tidycpt object

    ...

    arguments passed to methods

    See also

    wbs::changepoints()

    Examples

    cpts <- segment(DataCPSim, method = "ga", maxiter = 5)
#> method: ga
changepoints(cpts$segmenter)
#>    x1    x2    x3    x5    x8   x10   x11   x14   x22   x23   x24   x28   x30 
#>     1     2     3     5     8    10    11    14    22    23    24    28    30

cpts <- segment(DataCPSim, method = "pelt")
#> method: pelt
changepoints(cpts)
#> [1] 547 822 972

cpts <- segment(DataCPSim, method = "wbs")
#> method: wbs
changepoints(cpts$segmenter)
#>  [1]  547  809  810  822  823  939  953  972  981  982  997  999 1031 1033 1040
#> [16] 1041 1063 1066
